coffee_with_aliens.subtext: Enjoy a cup of coffee with extraterrestrial friends at Area 51. Tuesdays at 3:00 AM.
coffee_with_aliens.title: Coffee with Aliens

top_secret_mission.subtext: Embark on a top-secret espionage mission. Codename: Operation Stealth.
top_secret_mission.title: Top Secret Mission

haunted_mansion_explore.subtext: Explore a haunted mansion with professional ghost hunters. Bring your own proton pack.
haunted_mansion_explore.title: Haunted Mansion Explore

hidden_booty_quest.subtext: Embark on a quest to find hidden pirate treasure. X marks the spot on Treasure Island.
hidden_booty_quest.title: Hidden Booty Quest
